name: OGame Redesign: Fold equipment in overview
description: Minimizes the details of the equipment, freeing up more space for the event list.
css:
@namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);

@-moz-document domain("ogame.org"),
domain("ogame.com.br"),
domain("ogame.cz"),
domain("ogame.de"),
domain("ogame.dk"),
domain("ogame.com.es"),
domain("ogame.fr"),
domain("ogame.gr"),
domain("ogame.com.hr"),
domain("ogame.hu"),
domain("ogame.it"),
domain("ogame.jp"),
domain("ogame.lt"),
domain("ogame.lv"),
domain("ogame.nl"),
domain("ogame.no"),
domain("ogame.pl"),
domain("ogame.com.pt"),
domain("ogame.ro"),
domain("ogame.rs"),
domain("ogame.ru"),
domain("ogame.se"),
domain("ogame.si"),
domain("ogame.sk"),
domain("ogame.com.tr"),
domain("ogame.tw"),
domain("ogame.us") {

#overviewBottom div.clearfloat + div.content-box-s div.content,
#overviewBottom div.clearfloat + div.content-box-s div.footer,
#overviewBottom div.clearfloat + div.content-box-s + div.content-box-m div.content,
#overviewBottom div.clearfloat + div.content-box-s + div.content-box-m div.footer {
    display: none !important;
}

}
